channel.title: Comments on: Spirituality and "Yeh Jawani Hai Deewani"

item.title: By: Chandrasekar Sivaraman
item.dc:creator: Chandrasekar Sivaraman
item.description: Nice one...Being spiritual is not same as being relegious....
item.content:encoded: Nice one…Being spiritual is not same as being relegious….

item.title: By: Easwar
item.dc:creator: Easwar
item.description: Spirituality is to have an open mind and accept all the possibilities. So you can never limit a spiritual person with some boundaries.<br />Being strictly spiritual is to be as free as possible.
item.content:encoded:
Spirituality is to have an open mind and accept all the possibilities. So you can never limit a spiritual person with some boundaries.
Being strictly spiritual is to be as free as possible.

item.title: By: Kesavan
item.dc:creator: Kesavan
item.description: Nice narration. You should write more about your Kashi trip. <br /><br />I guess I'm one of the million that thinks spiritual and religious are the same. Don't you think spiritual beings are religious about their spirituality? If so, doesn't that make them religious as well? If not, does that mean they are not strictly spiritual?<br />
item.content:encoded:
Nice narration. You should write more about your Kashi trip.

I guess I'm one of the million that thinks spiritual and religious are the same. Don't you think spiritual beings are religious about their spirituality? If so, doesn't that make them religious as well? If not, does that mean they are not strictly spiritual?
